DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether rTMS effective treatment tinnitus
DOC.detailed_description: Repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) dorsolateral prefrontal cortex ( DLPFC ) add-on effect primary auditory cortex rTMS improve tinnitus-related distress . We aim investigate whether rTMS dorsolateral prefrontal cortex primary auditory cortex capable reduce tinnitus loudness . Linked neuronavigation system guide magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) frontal temporal , rTMS suppress area cortical plasticity . This cortical reorganization demonstrate magnetoencephalography ( MEG )
